name: Survive
_source: if;not has_achievement('24') and {v:TraineeDeployed} == 4 and game.check_alive('Alpin') and game.check_alive('Carlin') and game.check_alive('Shayla') and game.check_alive('Raelin')
update_achievement;24;Beaten By A Buncha Kids;Deployed all trainees in Ch5 and had them survive
update_achievement;25;One Less War Crime;Cleared Ch5 without deploying any trainees
update_achievement;26;Gotoh The Bench;Cleared Ch5 without deploying your Gotoh
update_achievement;28;Merely A Footnote;Cleared Ch5 without killing Cawthorne
update_achievement;29;The Darkest Timeline;Cleared Ch5 after killing Cawthorne
update_achievement;33;Everyone's An Edgelord;Cleared the game without using any supports
update_achievement;35;Instructions Unclear;Got the generic visit dialogue for every house
update_achievement;36;All That For Nothing;Kept all playable units alive throughout the game
update_achievement;38;Do Them Dirty, In Front Of They Squad;Killed all lieutenants and Cawthorne in Ch5
update_achievement;39;Hardly Trying;Cleared Ch5 on Hard after killing Cawthorne
update_achievement;40;Absolute Lunatic;Cleared Ch5 on Lunatic after killing Cawthorne
